name: Toby the Disco Turtle
description:
Mark every tile on the map to win. Change the mode from top down to platformer whenever you want and rotate the screen. Unlock all levels by hold keys: "K" "O" "X"

Authors:

Kandif - Programming

Zamyślona Olga - Graphics

Emma Almond - Music/Sounds

Thanks for testing:

Deepmind, DVTB, krasnal
